actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for daylight saving time for the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that daylight saving time shall be observed from the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually. Repeals the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for daylight saving time for the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually, and for other purposes.
